Headline: 59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Halsted
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 63rd, Union, 59th & Halsted due to fire department activity near 59th/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip

#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 63rd, Union, 59th and Halsted due to fire department activity near 59th/Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Delayed near 47th to 47th Ct
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains will be standing due to an authorized person on the tracks between 47th and 47th Ct. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains will be standing due to an authorized person on the tracks between 47th and 47th Ct.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
